Police charge teenager with murder of Auckland security guard Ramandeep Singh in Massey https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-charges-teenager-with-murder-of-auckland-security-guard-death-ramandeep-singh-in-massey/BUC74YMBARAL7F7BU4VXNAINAE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-charges-teenager-with-murder-of-auckland-security-guard-death-ramandeep-singh-in-massey/BUC74YMBARAL7F7BU4VXNAINAE/ The arrest comes after a 26-year-old man was also charged with murder. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 06:29:58 +0000 Security guard Ramandeep Singh, 25, was killed in Massey's Royal Reserve carpark just after midnight on December 18.

Auckland ‘pork’ tagger’s video of vandalism above motorway traffic https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-pork-taggers-video-of-vandalism-above-motorway-traffic/P7QKMRI3QFGLND435A3LFG737M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-pork-taggers-video-of-vandalism-above-motorway-traffic/P7QKMRI3QFGLND435A3LFG737M/ Raphael FranksFootage shows two people running across a lane of motorway traffic before tagging signs. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 07:02:28 +0000 A prolific Auckland tagger has posted a frightening video of himself and an accomplice climbing above lanes of speeding motorway traffic and vandalising direction signs.
